channel.title: Silk buyer

item.title: Silk buyer
item.dc:creator: @z_darkmage77 z darkmage77
item.description:
@z_darkmage77 wrote:

This is an autobuyer for the silk seller in alkarid, you cant use a normal autobuyer because this needs a lot of “talking” with the person. You could buy silk there at 2 gp ea then sell at Varrok (Thesselia’s fine clothes) 16gp ea, which basically octruples your money.
This is only my third script though and you could make it better by changing the places where you click with a color finder.

[table][tr][td]////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// //
// AutoSilkBuyer 1.0 //
// //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// //
//-Macro will run until your last inventory space is filled with silk //
// //
//-Run in 1024x768 resolution //
// //
//-Without antirandoms and antiban //
// //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// //
//-Recommended for silk merchandisers at alkarid //
// //
//-Silk costs 3 gp ea as the price Ali asks you but you can choose 2 gp which //
// //
//is what happens with this macro //
// //
//-You can sell the silk for 16 gp ea at Thesselia’s in Varrok //
// //
//-Which basically octruples your money (8x) //
// //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program New;
var
x,y,a,b: integer;
begin
repeat
if FindColorTolerance(x,y,11231916,0,0,1000,700,20)=true then
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
wait(100)
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
wait(200)
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
wait(1500)
clickmouse(269,445,true);
wait(1500)
clickmouse(256,398,true);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(196,446,true);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(282,448,true);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(244,398,true);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(209,447,true);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(260,449,true);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(257,447,true);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(223,399,true);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(192,450,true);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(278,447,true);
wait(1000)
until findcolortolerance(a,b,8822697,703,435,718,452,50);
end.[/table][br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 05:34:32 PM[/size][hr]sorta usless actually
